author: Thomas Rebbe
comment: This alarm is a life saver! I used to use the Google alarm, but it wasn't enough. I'm the kind of guy that needs like 10 alarms every 5 minutes just to wake up. With the math problems and the notification thing that checks if you're actually awake, however, I only need one alarm, because that will make sure I'm actually consious for more than a minute. I'm very much loving this app. Thank you!

author: Shubhendu Pal
comment: Update: The best alarm app. Only one which can properly identify odd even Saturday.   So far so good, yet to test fully. Can you please add odd and even Saturday settings in weekly alarms? I need alarms on odd Saturday only. Check sleep as android app for reference. Update: working so good. Upvoted 5 star.

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Thank you very much!

author: Manos Kar
comment: What can I say. If you guys keep up with support and features, I'm never changing this app. Amazing so far.

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Thanks a lot! We constantly develop and update the app, plus you can always reach us with the Help and feedback menu in case you run into any question. Thanks!

comment: Best loud and annoying alarm ever never late for work

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep

comment: Great app. I want to pay for it but it keeps trying to bill my other google account.

reply.content: Thanks. Would you please send a message with the Help and feedback menu of the app so we could try to help you with this?

comment: For people who need a more customizable approach to alarms, this is the app you absolutely NEED.

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep

comment: Great

author: Lane White
comment: This app has a pre-alarm, alarm, and post-alarm option for each alarm you set. This is great for me, because I wake up a lot easier with this app. I hit the snooze button less, and I don't need to set a million alarms each morning now. I would recommend this app.

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Thank you so much for your great feedback! Glad to hear that you like the features!

comment: Best alarm ever, and I've tried many. Has never failed after a couple years - knock on wood

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Thank you very much!

comment: Good app. Better selection of ringtones would make it a 5 star app. Overall one of the best alarm apps I've used.

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Thanks

comment: One of the best alarm apps out here. I have even managed to get a dynamic alarm based on sunrise using its calendar feature. That could be something you could build into it too to make things easier.

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Thanks a lot! Great idea, we'll try to add such feature.

comment: Wake up you fool! Ok ok I'm awake man! Chill! You gonna fall asleep again? Hell to the no

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep

comment: It good for heavy sleepers. quick developer response. It worked thanks.

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep

comment: It doesn't go off sometime. Otherwise it's very good.

author: Emmanuel Palayan
comment: I enjoy the app however since installing, I have been bombarded with ads. The app must be open 24/7 which means ads are pushed 24/7. Even on my homescreen.

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content:
Ads can help to support the development of the app, it's shown only after the alarm, and can be removed for a symbolical amount. Thanks for understanding.
If you happen to have any question or run into an issue, just send an in-app message please with the Help and feedback menu so we can help you. Thanks

author: Dalton A.
comment: It's loaded with features and dev helped me find the full screen clock so it can replace the one I have on my nightstand. That clock feature is buried deep in layers of settings. Dev, please make the nightstand clock activate with 1 tap. Also allow for font size/color/etc. customization, show the next alarm time, sliding dimmer would be cool, maybe weather underneath the time, autostart when charger is connected. These features would make this alarm app best in plastered by a mile. Thanks.

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Thanks a lot! We'll try to improve this part of the app as well!

author: I Am Not Telling Y'all!!!!
comment: I love this app however when I got it there used to be a function where one time, no repast alarms disappeared after use. I LOVED that feature. Kept my alarms organized coz I have plenty lol.  Now the alarm list is all cluttered with disabled, no repeat alarms. Could the app have the option to turn that option on and off? Other than that, it's amazing all around

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Would you please send a message with the Help and feedback menu of the app? We'd like to help you with this. You still have all those options, try to use the "Date specific" alarm recurrence type, and enable the "Hide expired alarms" option on the main screen of the app so after they go off they will disappear. Thank you.

comment: For heavy sleepers or any one looking for a discent slarm this is the one for you.  I think this is decent enough and could be a little louder but it actually works with a sub feature like a snooze function that asks if you are awake before sounding the alarm. Great extra feature and if aomeone finds a better one please inform me as i will not be lookingfor another while this one still works.

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Thank you so much for your awesome feedback!

author: dietriterocks
comment: Well it's a pain in the ass for sure because I cannot turn this off without solving math problems. It's works very well to the point of being annoying 😂  The ad is so slow to load though. I understand needing the ads for sure but they do take a bit to load and your phone is disabled while it's loading.

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Thank you very much! Will look into this as well.

author: Teresa Briann Lohr
comment: Overall I've been thrilled with this alarm. However, when I used to hit the + button to start a new alarm, it gave me options like countdown alarm, which I loved! Now it just starts a new daily alarm! Did the other options go away permanently or did I do something? I can't figure it out. I would love to have the other options back.

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: When you are on the alarm add/edit screen select the Countdown Timer option from the top dropdown list (Recurrence). Here you will find all the options regarding how your alarm should repeat. Would you please check this and consider updating your rating? Just send a message please with the Help and feedback menu so we could help you with this. Thx

author: Dylon Rossini
comment: With location tracking, being the previous question that was asked during this survey... id love more info as to why that was asked.Just seems random to ask in a survey. when im sure 65% of the answers are going to be not sure when really 65% really are not sure .. apart from that this app has saved my reputation with work, meetings, gatherings etc.. the pre alarm interacted with the main alarm with multiple alarms on amdroid is genius. Theres no chance of not waking up... it fits my life perfect, ive regained control back.i really cant fault it one bit... does what it says... im even feeling more proactive as im not over sleeping anymore..   A+++++ well done amdroid soz bout the rant 😂😂😂😂

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Thank you so much. Would you please send a message with the Help and feedback menu? Would be great to discuss your feedback! Thanks!

author: Monica Mertz
comment: Great features, but buggy. Post alarm is supposed to confirm you're awake. Its actually an endless 10 minute snooze that never. Stops. Going. Off. Its been about an hour now, and the damned thing is still asking me to solve a math question every 10 minutes. Short of turning off the entire alarm or disabling the feature in this profile, can't find a way to make it stop. I'm awake, already!!

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Can you please send a message with the Help and feedback menu so we can help you quickly? The post alarm confirmation is actually the notification (or it's shown on the main screen as well), which asks if "Are you awake?". You need to confirm it by clicking on the "Yes", unless the alarm will go off again.

author: Adrian McKee
comment: Works like a charm! I am vision impaired and I would like to recommend this to others with the same problem. Many apps are impossible to see and use. I think this one should be advertised with this wonderful asset. It truly sets it apart from most of the others. I have never had it fail once. Excellent!

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Thank you so much for your awesome feedback!

author: Meghan Courtright
comment: I would like this app more if the ads weren't so frustrating. They take forever to load and usurp my phone in the meantime. I would go back to the alarm app that came installed on my phone if my phone company wasn't too cheap to get their own app. That one has ads too. It's an unpleasant experience to be so frustrated with an app just as I'm waking up.  I don't mind that there are ads but the app doesn't seem capable of loading the ads reasonably fast and they take their time closing.

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content:
Sorry to hear that, your feedback is appreciated.
Ads can help to support the development of the app, it's shown after the alarm, and can be removed for a symbolical amount. Thanks for understanding.
If you happen to have any question or run into an issue, just send an in-app message please with the Help and feedback menu so we can help you. Thanks

author: Rafi Ezratty
comment: I love this app. I tried many other alarm apps, and this one is the best. Very good and reliable. Many options. The only thing I don't like (and the reason for 4 stars) is that when I dismiss the pre-alarm, the main alarm starts anyways. Not much point in that, is there?

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content:
Thanks.
The app can't really decide if you dismissed the prealarm half asleep, or because you actually woke up. The idea here is that if you indeed woke up, then you can just click on the "Skip" action button of the next alarm notification, which will skip the main alarm. This 1 simple step can make sure you won't oversleep. I hope this helps.

author: Grace Brewer
comment: I began a new job recently, and unknowingly I was shutting my alarm off in my sleep and making myself late! It was mortifying and embarrassing to show up late, and it put my position in jeporady. However, Amdroid is perfect for me. I set 2 math questions and a 10 min post-alarm as a failsafe. It hasn't failed me yet and I suggest it to all!

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Thank you so much! So good to hear this!

author: Simon Hill
comment: Had uninstalled before but decided to give it another go. Set a new time, it showed time remaining before it will activate. I am certain it did not go off....missed a flight, out of pocket +$500. I uninstalled so lost proof and only reinstalled to give feedback

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Very sorry to hear that. Most of the times this is caused by battery optimization features or apps, which remove the scheduled alarms. We'd love to help you with this issue, just send a message please with the Help and feedback menu of the app. Thank you.

author: David Vogel
comment: When I got a new phone my old alarm was too quiet. This one is awesome. Quite loud and very easy to set single and repeating alarms. It tells you the weather when it goes off and reminds you of things on your calender. Excellent app.

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Thank you so much for your great feedback!

author: Daniel Hinbest
comment: It works great! It won't let me oversleep. Since I got this app, I have been waking up at a good time for school everyday. I've never been happy to be frustrated. The reason why is because it doesn't shut up until I am doing my goals

reply.author: AMdroid Alarm Clock - No more oversleep
reply.content: Thank you so much! So good to hear that it helps!
